body.raw: {"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"NONE","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"Worldline Auth Hmac HostedCheckoutRequest _export","secret":"${vars.apiSecret}","source":"<#assign result = \"POST\\napplication/json\\n\" + auth.hmac.hmacFields.date + \"\\n/\" + vars.apiVersion + \"/\" + input.merchantId + \"/hostedcheckouts\\n\">\n${result}","id":492,"isHmacSignature":true,"hmacFields":{"date":"<#assign date = .now?string[\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss 'GMT'\"]>${date}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}

{"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"NONE","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"Worldline Auth Hmac Capture_export","secret":"${vars.apiSecret}","source":"<#assign result = \"POST\\napplication/json\\n\" + auth.hmac.hmacFields.date + \"\\n/\" + vars.apiVersion + \"/\" + input.merchantId + \"/payments/\"+input.pspReference+\"/capture\\n\">\n${result}","id":524,"isHmacSignature":true,"hmacFields":{"date":"<#assign date = .now?string[\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss 'GMT'\"]>${date}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}

{"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"NONE","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"Worldline Auth Hmac Refund_export","secret":"${vars.apiSecret}","source":"<#assign result = \"POST\\napplication/json\\n\" + auth.hmac.hmacFields.date + \"\\n/\" + vars.apiVersion + \"/\" + input.merchantId + \"/payments/\"+input.settlementPspReference+\"/refund\\n\">\n${result}","id":525,"isHmacSignature":true,"hmacFields":{"date":"<#assign date = .now?string[\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss 'GMT'\"]>${date}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}

{"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"NONE","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"Worldline Auth Hmac Reversal_export","secret":"${vars.apiSecret}","source":"<#assign result = \"POST\\napplication/json\\n\" + auth.hmac.hmacFields.date + \"\\n/\" + vars.apiVersion + \"/\" + input.merchantId + \"/payments/\"+input.authorizationPspReference+\"/cancel\\n\">\n${result}","id":526,"isHmacSignature":true,"hmacFields":{"date":"<#assign date = .now?string[\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss 'GMT'\"]>${date}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}

{"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"NONE","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"Worldline Auth Hmac Reauth_export","secret":"${vars.apiSecret}","source":"<#assign result = \"POST\\napplication/json\\n\" + auth.hmac.hmacFields.date + \"\\n/\" + vars.apiVersion + \"/\" + input.merchantId + \"/payments\\n\">\n${result}","id":527,"isHmacSignature":true,"hmacFields":{"date":"<#assign date = .now?string[\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss 'GMT'\"]>${date}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}

{"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"NONE","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"Worldline Auth Hmac HostedCheckoutStatus_export","secret":"${vars.apiSecret}","source":"<#assign result = \"GET\\n\" +\"\\n\"+ auth.hmac.hmacFields.getDate + \"\\n/\" + vars.apiVersion + \"/\" + input.merchantId + \"/hostedcheckouts/\"+input.customFields.hostedCheckoutId+\"\\n\">\n${result}","id":536,"isHmacSignature":true,"hmacFields":{"getDate":"<#assign date = .now?string[\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss 'GMT'\"]>${date}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}
